Sentencas: Ce0.82Sm0.16Sr0.02O1.90 (SSDC) based nanocomposites with different weight ratio of the eutectic mixture of Na2CO3-Li2CO3 have been prepared by mixing nanocrystalline powders of co-doped ceria with the carbonates.
Titulo: High electrical conductivity of nanocomposites based on Ce0.82Sm0.16Sr0.02O1.90 and (Li/Na)2 CO3 for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Single phase formation has been confirmed using X-ray diffraction (XRD).
Titulo: High electrical conductivity of nanocomposites based on Ce0.82Sm0.16Sr0.02O1.90 and (Li/Na)2 CO3 for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Samples sintered at 700 degrees C are characterized by scanning electron microscope (SEM), energy dispersive spectroscopy (EDS), thermal expansion and impedance analysis.
Titulo: High electrical conductivity of nanocomposites based on Ce0.82Sm0.16Sr0.02O1.90 and (Li/Na)2 CO3 for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: SEM micrographs show a homogeneous distribution of both the phases.
Titulo: High electrical conductivity of nanocomposites based on Ce0.82Sm0.16Sr0.02O1.90 and (Li/Na)2 CO3 for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A sharp jump in the conductivity has been observed in all the composites at a particular temperature.
Titulo: High electrical conductivity of nanocomposites based on Ce0.82Sm0.16Sr0.02O1.90 and (Li/Na)2 CO3 for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This is attributed to a superionic transition at the interfaces formed between the ceria and the carbonate phases.
Titulo: High electrical conductivity of nanocomposites based on Ce0.82Sm0.16Sr0.02O1.90 and (Li/Na)2 CO3 for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Conductivity of the composites increases with increasing the carbonate content due to increase in the interfacial area between the two phases.
Titulo: High electrical conductivity of nanocomposites based on Ce0.82Sm0.16Sr0.02O1.90 and (Li/Na)2 CO3 for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Composition containing 35 wt% of the carbonates shows the maximum conductivity, 7.48 x 10(-2)
Titulo: High electrical conductivity of nanocomposites based on Ce0.82Sm0.16Sr0.02O1.90 and (Li/Na)2 CO3 for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: S-cm(-1) at 500 degrees C with activation energy of conduction 0.48 eV.
Titulo: High electrical conductivity of nanocomposites based on Ce0.82Sm0.16Sr0.02O1.90 and (Li/Na)2 CO3 for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This value is one order of magnitude more than that of SSDC.
Titulo: High electrical conductivity of nanocomposites based on Ce0.82Sm0.16Sr0.02O1.90 and (Li/Na)2 CO3 for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells
